desc: Premium merino wool socks made in the USA and backed by a Hassle-Free Lifetime Guarantee. Thru-hiker tested hiking socks, trail rated running socks, and ultra soft socks for everyday comfort.

layout.text: MADE IN THE USA - LIFETIME GUARANTEE
